```{css, echo=FALSE}
.typewriter h2{
  width: auto;
  display: inline-block;
  overflow: hidden;
  border-right: .1em solid black;
  white-space: nowrap;
  margin: 0 auto;
  animation: typing 5s steps(100, end),
			 blink-caret 1s step-end infinite;
}

@keyframes typing{
  from {max-width: 0}
  to {max-width: 100%}
}

@keyframes blink-caret{
  from, to {border-color: transparent}
  50% {border-color: black}
}
```

<div class="typewriter">
  <h2>Hi, I'm Lennart!</h2>
</div>

I like to extract knowledge from data and live my passion as a Research Associate in the [Econometrics Group](https://www.uni-bielefeld.de/fakultaeten/wirtschaftswissenschaften/lehrbereiche/econometrics/) at Bielefeld University.

In my spare time you can find me above the clouds, on the tennis court, or in front of a chess board.

I use this website to present my [research](research.html), list my [talks](talks.html), and share some [tutorials](tutorials.html).

You can download my CV [here](cv/oelschlaeger.pdf) and find a list of my publications [here](https://scholar.google.com/citations?hl=de&user=k9n1yt4AAAAJ).
